Package com.example.breadheadsinventorymanager

Class ItemList

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
java.util.ArrayList<Item>
com.example.breadheadsinventorymanager.ItemList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Item>, Collection<Item>, List<Item>, RandomAccess
public class ItemList extends ArrayList<Item>
List of items. Keeps track of the sum of the items present in the list through modification.
See Also:

    • sort

      public void sort(String field, boolean ascending)
      Sorts the ItemList by the given parameter in either ascending or descending order.
      Parameters:
      field - The field to sort by. Supports "description", "comment", "date", "make", "value", or "tags".
      ascending - True if the sorted list should be ascending, else false.
